author: Chad Solomon
description: This riff on a Brooklyn is one of many to emerge since 2006 but is one of the more enduring.
name: Bensonhurst
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
5 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
